reviews.productTitle: Eaton 271W-BOX 15-Amps 120/277V Traditional Heavy Duty Grade Two Single-Pole Switches, White
reviews.text: I could have bought a cheap switch that would be as good as this one. Rather than operate quietly, it clicks loudly as it snaps from one position to another. I have 45 years of experience and Eaton is usually top quality, but not so on this one. I'll go to Home Depot and get one that is quiet.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.title: A switch that costs this much should be silent rather than snappy and loud clicking.

reviews.productTitle: Eaton 271W-BOX 15-Amps 120/277V Traditional Heavy Duty Grade Two Single-Pole Switches, White
reviews.text: In general, I am a big fan of Cooper Wiring devices and have used many different types in the past. This is the first time I have run into a problem. Most outlet / switch devices have ears that can be snapped off to mount them in a utility box with a curved edge top. These particular switches have snap off ears, but after they are snapped off, the remaining tab sticks up so high that they will not fit under the curved edge cover for a utility box. I put a Cooper Wiring outlet into a 4x4 Raco box on one side by snapping off the ears. But when I tried to mount this Cooper Wiring switch on the other side in the same box, I saw that after snapping off the ears, it would not fit. I had to use heavy pliers to manually bend part of the tab down enough so it would fit, but not so much that the bent section would interfere with the screw mount. The tab is a heavy gauge metal and is very difficult to bend. If I ever have to do this type of install again, I will have to use a different model switch. Now you know what to expect. For a regular wall mount, these should be fine.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2021
reviews.title: Does not fit curved edge utility box cover.

reviews.text: Needed a double switch for bathroom light & fan. Perfect. Although, be aware that this version is very "clicky" so if you don't want to hear a loud CLACK! everytime you turn the switch on/off pay attention to what you are looking at (because I didn't). Not a deal killer tho, but definitely not like all of my other switches which have a smoother, softer action.

reviews.productTitle: Eaton 271W-BOX 15-Amps 120/277V Traditional Heavy Duty Grade Two Single-Pole Switches, White
reviews.text: Fast shipping. I don't have Amazon Prime. Ordered on 4/24 through a seller on Amazon without having to do a $25 minimum purchase. Arrived 4/29. Went to Home Depot first. Saw the line. Came back. Replacement for a 25+ year old Leviton switch. This Eaton switch's wiring configuration is slightly different than Leviton but overall an easy install. Yet to see if it will last as long as the old Leviton switch. It's a toggle switch. Does make a click sound. Doesn't bother me.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
reviews.title: EATON 271W-BOX Arrow Hart 271W Duplex Grounding Toggle Switch

reviews.productTitle: Eaton 271W-BOX 15-Amps 120/277V Traditional Heavy Duty Grade Two Single-Pole Switches, White
reviews.text: I have one of these dual switch units in my kitchen hooked up to a light and the garbage disposal. I went to Home Depot and Lowes to replace it thinking it was a common thing - but neither had it. I should have looked on Amazon first. It was delivered next day and worked like a charm.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
reviews.title: Just what I needed.

reviews.productTitle: Eaton 271W-BOX 15-Amps 120/277V Traditional Heavy Duty Grade Two Single-Pole Switches, White
reviews.text: This switch seems to be a pretty solid design. Switches are thick - which I like - since my previous toggle switch handle broke off. Guess that's what happens over time. Installation wasn't too bad. Although, I would say to be sure you read the instructions to understand which wiring diagram applies to your application. There is a 'metal tab' that needs to remain in place for certain switching arrangements, but broken/removed for others. I would say this is the only 'trickery' involved. Otherwise, solid switch from EATON. Have been using for 1 week - so far so good!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
reviews.title: Solid Design; Works Great; A Little Tricky To Install
